{
  "Allegations" : "THE BASIS OF THIS COMPLAINT SURROUNDS MARKET PERFORMANCE AND LACK OF ACTIVE TRADING IN HIS TWO TOPS MODEL PORTFOLIO ADVISORY ACCOUNTS.  THE LACK OF TRADING AND COMMUNICATION FROM HIS ADVISOR CONTRIBUTED TO POOR MARKET PERFORMANCE.",
  "Settlement Amount" : "$5,347.78",
  "DisplayAAOLinkIfExists" : "N",
  "arbitrationClaimFiledDetail" : "",
  "arbitrationDocketNumber" : "",
  "Broker Comment" : "THE FIRM REVIEWED THE CLAIM AND FOUND IT TO BE WITHOUT MERIT. YET IN THE INTEREST OF SATISFYING THE CUSTOMER, THE FIRM AND THE INVESTMENT ADVISOR REPRESENTATIVE AGREED TO REFUND ADVISORY FEES PAID FOR THE PREVIOUS THREE QUARTERS, A TOTAL OF $5,348.78, IN EXCHANGE FOR THE CUSTOMER AGREEING TO MOVE THE ACCOUNTS TO A FIRM WHERE THE ASSETS COULD BE MANAGED ON A FULLY DISCRETIONARY BASIS AND HOLDINGS ACTIVELY TRADED. A FULL AND FINAL RELEASE WAS SIGNED BY THE CUSTOMER ON 6-20-2013."
}

{
  "Allegations" : "CUSTOMER IS DISSATISFIED WITH THE PERFORMANCE OF HIS VARIABLE LIFE POLICY, AND ALLEGES THE POLICY SHOULD BE PAID UP.",
  "DisplayAAOLinkIfExists" : "N",
  "arbitrationClaimFiledDetail" : "",
  "arbitrationDocketNumber" : "",
  "Broker Comment" : "UPON FULL REVIEW, THE POLICY HOLDER WAS PROVIDED FULL DISCLOSURES OF INVESTMENT RISK ASSOCIATED WITH THE INVESTMENT AT INCEPTION, AND AT EACH OF SEVERAL POLICY CHANGES THE OWNER HAS MADE SINCE ISSUE.  THE CLAIM IS DENIED WITHOUT MERIT."
